action

title: DIVI Quality Indicator 5a: Stop Orders for Invasive Devices

description:

All Intensive Care Patients with invasive devices should have a daily re-evaluation regarding the necessity of each device.

code: Guideline-based Care

definition: Stop Orders for Invasive Devices

action

title: DIVI Quality Indicator 5b: Hand Disinfectant Consumption

description:

The consumption of hand disinfectant should be more than 80 litres per 1000 days.

code: Guideline-based Care

definition: Hand Disinfectant Consumption

action

title: DIVI Quality Indicator 5c: Infection-per-Device Ratio

description:

The number of infections per invasive devices should be low.

code: Guideline-based Care

definition: Infection-per-Device Ratio

action

title: DIVI Quality Indicator 5d: Pneumonia-per-Ventilated-Patients Ratio

description:

The number of pneumonia cases per ventilated patients should be low.

definition: Pneumonia-per-Ventilated-Patients Ratio
